vote.title: To recognize the Grand Opening of Three Bites Bakery in King-Lincoln-Bronzeville.
vote.description:
Title
To recognize the Grand Opening of Three Bites Bakery in King-Lincoln-Bronzeville.
Body
WHEREAS, Three Bites Bakery was created in 2019 by entrepreneur Isabella Bonello; and
WHEREAS, March is Womenâ€™s History month and it is important to recognize the achievements and contributions of women in our community; and
WHEREAS, Three Bites Bakery supports other small businesses and people of color; and 
WHEREAS, despite setbacks from the COVID-19 pandemic Isabella Bonello persevered and continued forward to pursue her dream of opening this location; and
WHEREAS, Three Bites Bakery held its grand opening Saturday March 12th, 2022; now, therefore
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize Isabella Bonello for the grand opening of Three Bites Bakery in the King-Lincoln-Bronzeville neighborhood.
